references_text: The massive gorges, crystal clear rock pools and waterfalls of Karijini National Park are a must-see. Just off the coast, the Damp...
references_markdown:
![THE 5 BEST Things to Do in Dampier Peninsula (2025)](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-8b141e454aa2:12)
In Dampier, you can `explore the Murujuga National Park to see ancient rock art, visit the Red Dog statue, and relax on the foreshore at Shark Cage Beach or Hearson's Cove`.You can also enjoy water activities like boating, fishing, diving, and snorkeling in the [Dampier Archipelago](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Dampier+Archipelago&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegQIOhAB).  
[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/karratha/#:~:text=Karratha%20is%20the%20perfect%20base,the%20port%20town%20of%20Dampier.)[[3]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/dampier-foreshore/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20Foreshore%20offers%20shaded,a%20couple%20of%20hours%20relaxing.)[[4]](https://www.outlooktraveller.com/destinations/international/did-you-know-about-pilbara-among-the-oldest-places-on-earth#:~:text=Another%20must-see%20attraction%20is%20the%20Murujuga%20National,the%20town%20which%20travellers%20must%20not%20miss.)[[5]](https://dampierseafarers.org/history/dampier/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20area%20is%20home,animals%2C%20animal%20tracks%20and%20symbols.)

Culture and history

- ![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-8b141e454aa2:13)
**Murujuga National Park:** Explore the world's largest collection of petroglyphs (ancient rock art).[[1]](https://www.outlooktraveller.com/destinations/international/did-you-know-about-pilbara-among-the-oldest-places-on-earth#:~:text=Another%20must-see%20attraction%20is%20the%20Murujuga%20National,the%20town%20which%20travellers%20must%20not%20miss.)[[2]](https://dampierseafarers.org/history/dampier/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20area%20is%20home,animals%2C%20animal%20tracks%20and%20symbols.)
- ![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-8b141e454aa2:14)
**[Yaburara Heritage Trail](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Yaburara+Heritage+Trail&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegQIRRAB):** Walk a trail that passes through sacred sites and features ancient tools and petroglyphs.[[1]](https://www.discoveryholidayparks.com.au/journeys/the-warlu-way/see-and-do/pilbara-karratha-guide#:~:text=YABURARA%20HERITAGE%20TRAIL.%20Paying%20respect%20to%20the,petroglyphs%2C%20euros%2C%20echidnas%2C%20and%20white%20trumpet%20flowers.)
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQW3iGTKISRst-DyOMdDGXm-s66j67BMnR7h0ldKiK2pR_r05rNwS0T&s=0)
**Red Dog Statue:** See the bronze statue of the famous outback dog in the town center.[[1]](https://www.outlooktraveller.com/destinations/international/did-you-know-about-pilbara-among-the-oldest-places-on-earth#:~:text=Another%20must-see%20attraction%20is%20the%20Murujuga%20National,the%20town%20which%20travellers%20must%20not%20miss.)
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRVRLvNrKdXDufP6gPK12d1Cve9o_q-g25_rOJVhCz8GQeWNbqGg0R7&s=0)
**North West Shelf Visitors Centre:** Learn about the region's industrial and natural history.

Nature and scenery

- **[Dampier Foreshore](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Dampier+Foreshore&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1wEQAQ):** Relax on the Esplanade, which features shaded picnic areas and walkways, or swim at Shark Cage Beach and [Hampton Harbour Beach](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Hampton+Harbour+Beach&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI6wEQAQ).[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/dampier-foreshore/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20Foreshore%20offers%20shaded,a%20couple%20of%20hours%20relaxing.)
- **Hearson's Cove:** Visit this scenic spot for beautiful views.[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/karratha/#:~:text=Karratha%20is%20the%20perfect%20base,the%20port%20town%20of%20Dampier.)
- **Dampier Archipelago:** Go boating, fishing, diving, and snorkeling in this island chain.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)
- **[Staircase to the Moon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Staircase+to+the+Moon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1AEQAQ):** If visiting during the right season, witness this natural phenomenon where the moon's reflection on the exposed mudflats creates a "staircase" effect.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)

Nearby attractions on the Dampier Peninsula

- **[Cape Leveque](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Cape+Leveque&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2wEQAQ):** Drive to the northern tip of the peninsula to see stunning coastlines and Aboriginal communities.[[1]](https://www.viator.com/en-AU/Dampier-Peninsula/d50985#:~:text=Cape%20Leveque.%20One%20of%20Australia's%20most%20stunning,to%20Aboriginal%20communities%20for%20some%207%2C000%20years.)
- **[Cygnet Bay Pearl Farm](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Cygnet+Bay+Pearl+Farm&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI3gEQAQ):** Visit Australia's oldest pearl farm.[[1]](https://www.waholidayguide.com.au/explore-wa/north-west-western-australia/north-west-region-guide/dampier-peninsula-western-australia#:~:text=Cygnet%20Bay%20Pearl%20Farm.%20The%20Dampier%20Peninsula,pearl%20farm%20in%20Australia%20at%20Cygnet%20Bay.)
- **[Middle Lagoon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Middle+Lagoon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2AEQAQ):** Enjoy empty beaches for swimming, snorkeling, and fishing.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/best-of-the-dampier-peninsula#:~:text=Middle%20Lagoon.%20If%20there's%20one%20place%20you,fishing%2C%20and%20lazing%20around%20with%20a%20book.)
- **[Penders Bay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penders+Bay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2gEQAQ):** Find rock pools, good fishing spots, and beautiful red cliffs with white sand beaches.Be aware of potential saltwater crocodile warnings.[[1]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OG-EeqxSP_U&t=937)[[2]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VGmV18EJYbw&t=188)

- **[Middle Lagoon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Middle+Lagoon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2AEQAQ):** Enjoy empty beaches for swimming, snorkeling, and fishing.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/best-of-the-dampier-peninsula#:~:text=Middle%20Lagoon.%20If%20there's%20one%20place%20you,fishing%2C%20and%20lazing%20around%20with%20a%20book.)
- **[Penders Bay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penders+Bay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2gEQAQ):** Find rock pools, good fishing spots, and beautiful red cliffs with white sand beaches.Be aware of potential saltwater crocodile warnings.[[1]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OG-EeqxSP_U&t=937)[[2]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VGmV18EJYbw&t=188)

In Dampier, you can `explore the Murujuga National Park to see ancient rock art, visit the Red Dog statue, and relax on the foreshore at Shark Cage Beach or Hearson's Cove`.You can also enjoy water activities like boating, fishing, diving, and snorkeling in the [Dampier Archipelago](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Dampier+Archipelago&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegQIOhAB).  
[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/karratha/#:~:text=Karratha%20is%20the%20perfect%20base,the%20port%20town%20of%20Dampier.)[[3]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/dampier-foreshore/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20Foreshore%20offers%20shaded,a%20couple%20of%20hours%20relaxing.)[[4]](https://www.outlooktraveller.com/destinations/international/did-you-know-about-pilbara-among-the-oldest-places-on-earth#:~:text=Another%20must-see%20attraction%20is%20the%20Murujuga%20National,the%20town%20which%20travellers%20must%20not%20miss.)[[5]](https://dampierseafarers.org/history/dampier/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20area%20is%20home,animals%2C%20animal%20tracks%20and%20symbols.)

Culture and history

- ![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-8b141e454aa2:13)
**Murujuga National Park:** Explore the world's largest collection of petroglyphs (ancient rock art).[[1]](https://www.outlooktraveller.com/destinations/international/did-you-know-about-pilbara-among-the-oldest-places-on-earth#:~:text=Another%20must-see%20attraction%20is%20the%20Murujuga%20National,the%20town%20which%20travellers%20must%20not%20miss.)[[2]](https://dampierseafarers.org/history/dampier/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20area%20is%20home,animals%2C%20animal%20tracks%20and%20symbols.)
- ![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-8b141e454aa2:14)
**[Yaburara Heritage Trail](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Yaburara+Heritage+Trail&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegQIRRAB):** Walk a trail that passes through sacred sites and features ancient tools and petroglyphs.[[1]](https://www.discoveryholidayparks.com.au/journeys/the-warlu-way/see-and-do/pilbara-karratha-guide#:~:text=YABURARA%20HERITAGE%20TRAIL.%20Paying%20respect%20to%20the,petroglyphs%2C%20euros%2C%20echidnas%2C%20and%20white%20trumpet%20flowers.)
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQW3iGTKISRst-DyOMdDGXm-s66j67BMnR7h0ldKiK2pR_r05rNwS0T&s=0)
**Red Dog Statue:** See the bronze statue of the famous outback dog in the town center.[[1]](https://www.outlooktraveller.com/destinations/international/did-you-know-about-pilbara-among-the-oldest-places-on-earth#:~:text=Another%20must-see%20attraction%20is%20the%20Murujuga%20National,the%20town%20which%20travellers%20must%20not%20miss.)
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRVRLvNrKdXDufP6gPK12d1Cve9o_q-g25_rOJVhCz8GQeWNbqGg0R7&s=0)
**North West Shelf Visitors Centre:** Learn about the region's industrial and natural history.

Nature and scenery

- **[Dampier Foreshore](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Dampier+Foreshore&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1wEQAQ):** Relax on the Esplanade, which features shaded picnic areas and walkways, or swim at Shark Cage Beach and [Hampton Harbour Beach](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Hampton+Harbour+Beach&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI6wEQAQ).[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/dampier-foreshore/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20Foreshore%20offers%20shaded,a%20couple%20of%20hours%20relaxing.)
- **Hearson's Cove:** Visit this scenic spot for beautiful views.[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/karratha/#:~:text=Karratha%20is%20the%20perfect%20base,the%20port%20town%20of%20Dampier.)
- **Dampier Archipelago:** Go boating, fishing, diving, and snorkeling in this island chain.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)
- **[Staircase to the Moon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Staircase+to+the+Moon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1AEQAQ):** If visiting during the right season, witness this natural phenomenon where the moon's reflection on the exposed mudflats creates a "staircase" effect.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)

- **[Middle Lagoon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Middle+Lagoon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2AEQAQ):** Enjoy empty beaches for swimming, snorkeling, and fishing.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/best-of-the-dampier-peninsula#:~:text=Middle%20Lagoon.%20If%20there's%20one%20place%20you,fishing%2C%20and%20lazing%20around%20with%20a%20book.)

- **[Dampier Foreshore](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Dampier+Foreshore&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1wEQAQ):** Relax on the Esplanade, which features shaded picnic areas and walkways, or swim at Shark Cage Beach and [Hampton Harbour Beach](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Hampton+Harbour+Beach&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI6wEQAQ).[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/dampier-foreshore/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20Foreshore%20offers%20shaded,a%20couple%20of%20hours%20relaxing.)
- **Hearson's Cove:** Visit this scenic spot for beautiful views.[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/karratha/#:~:text=Karratha%20is%20the%20perfect%20base,the%20port%20town%20of%20Dampier.)
- **Dampier Archipelago:** Go boating, fishing, diving, and snorkeling in this island chain.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)
- **[Staircase to the Moon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Staircase+to+the+Moon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1AEQAQ):** If visiting during the right season, witness this natural phenomenon where the moon's reflection on the exposed mudflats creates a "staircase" effect.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)

Nearby attractions on the Dampier Peninsula

- **[Cape Leveque](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Cape+Leveque&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2wEQAQ):** Drive to the northern tip of the peninsula to see stunning coastlines and Aboriginal communities.[[1]](https://www.viator.com/en-AU/Dampier-Peninsula/d50985#:~:text=Cape%20Leveque.%20One%20of%20Australia's%20most%20stunning,to%20Aboriginal%20communities%20for%20some%207%2C000%20years.)
- **[Cygnet Bay Pearl Farm](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Cygnet+Bay+Pearl+Farm&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI3gEQAQ):** Visit Australia's oldest pearl farm.[[1]](https://www.waholidayguide.com.au/explore-wa/north-west-western-australia/north-west-region-guide/dampier-peninsula-western-australia#:~:text=Cygnet%20Bay%20Pearl%20Farm.%20The%20Dampier%20Peninsula,pearl%20farm%20in%20Australia%20at%20Cygnet%20Bay.)
- **[Middle Lagoon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Middle+Lagoon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2AEQAQ):** Enjoy empty beaches for swimming, snorkeling, and fishing.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/best-of-the-dampier-peninsula#:~:text=Middle%20Lagoon.%20If%20there's%20one%20place%20you,fishing%2C%20and%20lazing%20around%20with%20a%20book.)
- **[Penders Bay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penders+Bay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2gEQAQ):** Find rock pools, good fishing spots, and beautiful red cliffs with white sand beaches.Be aware of potential saltwater crocodile warnings.[[1]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OG-EeqxSP_U&t=937)[[2]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VGmV18EJYbw&t=188)

- ![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-8b141e454aa2:14)
**[Yaburara Heritage Trail](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Yaburara+Heritage+Trail&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegQIRRAB):** Walk a trail that passes through sacred sites and features ancient tools and petroglyphs.[[1]](https://www.discoveryholidayparks.com.au/journeys/the-warlu-way/see-and-do/pilbara-karratha-guide#:~:text=YABURARA%20HERITAGE%20TRAIL.%20Paying%20respect%20to%20the,petroglyphs%2C%20euros%2C%20echidnas%2C%20and%20white%20trumpet%20flowers.)
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQW3iGTKISRst-DyOMdDGXm-s66j67BMnR7h0ldKiK2pR_r05rNwS0T&s=0)
**Red Dog Statue:** See the bronze statue of the famous outback dog in the town center.[[1]](https://www.outlooktraveller.com/destinations/international/did-you-know-about-pilbara-among-the-oldest-places-on-earth#:~:text=Another%20must-see%20attraction%20is%20the%20Murujuga%20National,the%20town%20which%20travellers%20must%20not%20miss.)

**North West Shelf Visitors Centre:** Learn about the region's industrial and natural history.

Nature and scenery

- **[Dampier Foreshore](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Dampier+Foreshore&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1wEQAQ):** Relax on the Esplanade, which features shaded picnic areas and walkways, or swim at Shark Cage Beach and [Hampton Harbour Beach](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Hampton+Harbour+Beach&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI6wEQAQ).[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/dampier-foreshore/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20Foreshore%20offers%20shaded,a%20couple%20of%20hours%20relaxing.)
- **Hearson's Cove:** Visit this scenic spot for beautiful views.[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/karratha/#:~:text=Karratha%20is%20the%20perfect%20base,the%20port%20town%20of%20Dampier.)
- **Dampier Archipelago:** Go boating, fishing, diving, and snorkeling in this island chain.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)
- **[Staircase to the Moon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Staircase+to+the+Moon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1AEQAQ):** If visiting during the right season, witness this natural phenomenon where the moon's reflection on the exposed mudflats creates a "staircase" effect.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)

- **[Middle Lagoon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Middle+Lagoon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2AEQAQ):** Enjoy empty beaches for swimming, snorkeling, and fishing.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/best-of-the-dampier-peninsula#:~:text=Middle%20Lagoon.%20If%20there's%20one%20place%20you,fishing%2C%20and%20lazing%20around%20with%20a%20book.)
- **[Penders Bay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penders+Bay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI2gEQAQ):** Find rock pools, good fishing spots, and beautiful red cliffs with white sand beaches.Be aware of potential saltwater crocodile warnings.[[1]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OG-EeqxSP_U&t=937)[[2]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VGmV18EJYbw&t=188)

- **[Dampier Foreshore](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Dampier+Foreshore&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1wEQAQ):** Relax on the Esplanade, which features shaded picnic areas and walkways, or swim at Shark Cage Beach and [Hampton Harbour Beach](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Hampton+Harbour+Beach&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI6wEQAQ).[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/dampier-foreshore/#:~:text=The%20Dampier%20Foreshore%20offers%20shaded,a%20couple%20of%20hours%20relaxing.)
- **Hearson's Cove:** Visit this scenic spot for beautiful views.[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/karratha/#:~:text=Karratha%20is%20the%20perfect%20base,the%20port%20town%20of%20Dampier.)
- **Dampier Archipelago:** Go boating, fishing, diving, and snorkeling in this island chain.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)
- **[Staircase to the Moon](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=90eb1434918bedd4&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Staircase+to+the+Moon&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi5rcOUr5ORAxUUhlYBHbP1MdAQxccNegUI1AEQAQ):** If visiting during the right season, witness this natural phenomenon where the moon's reflection on the exposed mudflats creates a "staircase" effect.[[1]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/places/dampier/56b266c22880253d74c4ee8c#:~:text=The%20massive%20gorges%2C%20crystal%20clear,to%20the%20Moon%2C%20is%20extraordinary.)

keyword: dampier things to do
ai_mode_summary:
In Dampier, you can explore the 42 islands of the Dampier Archipelago, see ancient rock art at [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIAhAD) , visit the famous Red Dog statue, and take a port tour of the massive industrial hub . A short drive to [Hearson's Cove](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k5mv32&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIAhAF) is also recommended for swimming and sunset viewing.[[1]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier-archipelago/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[3]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[4]](https://dampierseafarers.org/tours/#:~:text=Dampier%20Port%20Tours%20%7C%20Dampier%20-%20Mission,Harvesting%20in%20progress)

On and in the water

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-da8174a7688d:0)
Dampier As the entry point to this network of 42 islands and islets, Dampier is a prime location for water-based activities. The islands offer opportunities for swimming, fishing, snorkelling, diving, and boating. You can also see marine life such as turtles, dolphins, dugongs, and migrating humpback whales between July and September.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Dampier+Archipelago&kgmid=/m/024vbx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQgPwRegQIBBAB) 

![Image of Lethal Adventures](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSw0MDViSalp_oDzxt6ZeJz3vzvWaIEKGkJc22bO5jeyjD3BIK55h-FPDeA6omC6vqWhMQl-Ku9OsHdCbA3Ze49M4_q8aS4wKMdJT4RkxpJDpazYczVkqjQIZ_S4YdsmYhGG8LY4nA=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Lethal Adventures	

5.0(93)

Tour operator


Join a guided jet ski tour to explore the archipelago's remote beaches and hidden coves.

Pilbara Dive And Tours This operator offers scuba diving courses and guided shore and boat dives for all skill levels.

![Image of Hearson's Cove](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxLvfD4BFS4FLoYtrkMOdO76qmNKkTYRT_qSxKFE8IX7ELA4QvNJP0q9k4OajpUMK3uuhtyZB5soxDhtkbs1KdNGn0hcj6Bd61AiziTSBStXRJBo_kyrdCWS3bpP41Es5kDYoaUAA=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Hearson's Cove	

4.7(171)

Beach


Just a short drive from town, this beach on the Burrup Peninsula is popular for a relaxing swim or a picnic. It's also an excellent spot to watch the Staircase to the Moon phenomenon, which occurs on clear evenings with a full moon between March and October.[[1]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier-archipelago/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[3]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[4]](https://destinationpilbara.com.au/features/attractions#:~:text=Staircase%20to%20the%20Moon,Read%20More)

History, art, and culture

![Image of Murujuga National Park](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxUKcBUkM2cnNA_sbF3rcEtogweddqJ0yM5Q5RWAipal_g5J7bIoVtlNPYJ36zHAWvX7sL6k_Zj6jAa4-VyD8Ps8pWVl96XTf9n-ogP8CRR9HELxNOb5ynoDGL85MOwrgkd3yPX0b9UbyM=s108-w108-h144-n-k-no)

Murujuga National Park	

4.0(43)

National park


Located on the Burrup Peninsula, this park is home to one of the world's largest collections of Aboriginal rock art. You can take a walking tour with a Traditional Custodian to learn about the cultural significance of the petroglyphs.

Deep Gorge Found within [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIBhAJ) , this is an excellent spot to view the extensive ancient rock art and learn about Indigenous history.

![Image of Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxRQXMgkLAN4xd2flWjtaRXFhYbd_tlIuhEwa_fJia2vjwTlilDPFPMwFCE_2gZjuwU-YMNftCKsV8bXuyYOH7U21NMprxU2Ijg4rCAHaXE2kw2yuYBL9mjDXbrTx7umYdbIly3Tg=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia	

4.6(386)

Tourist attraction


No visit to Dampier is complete without a photo with the iconic statue of the Pilbara wanderer . You can also follow the [Red Dog Trail](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11bw1plsvk&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIBhAQ) around town to see places where the famous dog spent his time.

![Image of North West Shelf Visitors Centre](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSwQy4RUuKt4P1H4VlS7kbMEBsC5MkSE6TlkPKOBNPniP_wPSJRaONuBtLWZOgB-OrOgfN_qp9WhJRPbmxaWs95I1n0niQdIISyHB_W4ej3712jEuy1pww0wVDZZLJlOY0eLfItS5w=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

North West Shelf Visitors Centre	

4.0(46)

Visitor center


Learn about the region's major oil and gas operations at this modern and educational visitor centre.

Dampier Port Tour Run by the Mission to Seafarers, this tour offers a behind-the-scenes look at the town's massive port operations, including the iron ore and salt export facilities.[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.com.au/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html#:~:text=1.,Day%20Trips)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.ca/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[5]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier/)[[6]](https://dampierseafarers.org/tours/#:~:text=Dampier%20Port%20Tours%20%7C%20Dampier%20-%20Mission,Harvesting%20in%20progress)

Eating and relaxing

![Image of Dampier Foreshore](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSyebUDqE4tnnxUtlfLJwcexMpWKP3z1QVEhZSHJD5ex12wBM7gbMJXga_P0Ni6A5Qo-No9Fl2lITwnH3femeK3yHXAsBSeT0MCDHqmdhHw12k6BRfcU-b2XUVkCT9mzlYsPpOpB2Q=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Dampier Foreshore	

4.7(19)

Beach pavillion


A local favourite for a stroll or a picnic, this palm-lined esplanade offers beach access and shaded areas.

![Image of Soak In Dampier](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipNeyBJPtDzGqa7-YZCAFgZahI_Fg0ribCsLf21v=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Soak In Dampier	

4.3(363)

Deep Gorge Found within [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIBhAJ) , this is an excellent spot to view the extensive ancient rock art and learn about Indigenous history.

National park


Located on the Burrup Peninsula, this park is home to one of the world's largest collections of Aboriginal rock art. You can take a walking tour with a Traditional Custodian to learn about the cultural significance of the petroglyphs.

Deep Gorge Found within [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIBhAJ) , this is an excellent spot to view the extensive ancient rock art and learn about Indigenous history.

references_markdown:
In Dampier, you can explore the 42 islands of the Dampier Archipelago, see ancient rock art at [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIAhAD) , visit the famous Red Dog statue, and take a port tour of the massive industrial hub . A short drive to [Hearson's Cove](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k5mv32&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIAhAF) is also recommended for swimming and sunset viewing.[[1]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier-archipelago/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[3]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[4]](https://dampierseafarers.org/tours/#:~:text=Dampier%20Port%20Tours%20%7C%20Dampier%20-%20Mission,Harvesting%20in%20progress)

On and in the water

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-da8174a7688d:0)
Dampier As the entry point to this network of 42 islands and islets, Dampier is a prime location for water-based activities. The islands offer opportunities for swimming, fishing, snorkelling, diving, and boating. You can also see marine life such as turtles, dolphins, dugongs, and migrating humpback whales between July and September.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Dampier+Archipelago&kgmid=/m/024vbx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQgPwRegQIBBAB)

Lethal Adventures	

5.0(93)

Tour operator


Join a guided jet ski tour to explore the archipelago's remote beaches and hidden coves.

Pilbara Dive And Tours This operator offers scuba diving courses and guided shore and boat dives for all skill levels.

![Image of Hearson's Cove](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxLvfD4BFS4FLoYtrkMOdO76qmNKkTYRT_qSxKFE8IX7ELA4QvNJP0q9k4OajpUMK3uuhtyZB5soxDhtkbs1KdNGn0hcj6Bd61AiziTSBStXRJBo_kyrdCWS3bpP41Es5kDYoaUAA=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Hearson's Cove	

4.7(171)

Beach


Just a short drive from town, this beach on the Burrup Peninsula is popular for a relaxing swim or a picnic. It's also an excellent spot to watch the Staircase to the Moon phenomenon, which occurs on clear evenings with a full moon between March and October.[[1]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier-archipelago/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[3]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[4]](https://destinationpilbara.com.au/features/attractions#:~:text=Staircase%20to%20the%20Moon,Read%20More)

4.0(43)

National park


Located on the Burrup Peninsula, this park is home to one of the world's largest collections of Aboriginal rock art. You can take a walking tour with a Traditional Custodian to learn about the cultural significance of the petroglyphs.

Deep Gorge Found within [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIBhAJ) , this is an excellent spot to view the extensive ancient rock art and learn about Indigenous history.

![Image of Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxRQXMgkLAN4xd2flWjtaRXFhYbd_tlIuhEwa_fJia2vjwTlilDPFPMwFCE_2gZjuwU-YMNftCKsV8bXuyYOH7U21NMprxU2Ijg4rCAHaXE2kw2yuYBL9mjDXbrTx7umYdbIly3Tg=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

4.0(43)

National park


Located on the Burrup Peninsula, this park is home to one of the world's largest collections of Aboriginal rock art. You can take a walking tour with a Traditional Custodian to learn about the cultural significance of the petroglyphs.

Deep Gorge Found within [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIBhAJ) , this is an excellent spot to view the extensive ancient rock art and learn about Indigenous history.

Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia

Tourist attraction


No visit to Dampier is complete without a photo with the iconic statue of the Pilbara wanderer . You can also follow the [Red Dog Trail](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11bw1plsvk&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIBhAQ) around town to see places where the famous dog spent his time.

North West Shelf Visitors Centre	

4.0(46)

Visitor center


Learn about the region's major oil and gas operations at this modern and educational visitor centre.

Dampier Port Tour Run by the Mission to Seafarers, this tour offers a behind-the-scenes look at the town's massive port operations, including the iron ore and salt export facilities.[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.com.au/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html#:~:text=1.,Day%20Trips)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.ca/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[5]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier/)[[6]](https://dampierseafarers.org/tours/#:~:text=Dampier%20Port%20Tours%20%7C%20Dampier%20-%20Mission,Harvesting%20in%20progress)

Eating and relaxing

In Dampier, you can explore the 42 islands of the Dampier Archipelago, see ancient rock art at [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIAhAD) , visit the famous Red Dog statue, and take a port tour of the massive industrial hub . A short drive to [Hearson's Cove](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k5mv32&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQqdYPegQIAhAF) is also recommended for swimming and sunset viewing.[[1]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier-archipelago/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[3]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[4]](https://dampierseafarers.org/tours/#:~:text=Dampier%20Port%20Tours%20%7C%20Dampier%20-%20Mission,Harvesting%20in%20progress)

Dampier As the entry point to this network of 42 islands and islets, Dampier is a prime location for water-based activities. The islands offer opportunities for swimming, fishing, snorkelling, diving, and boating. You can also see marine life such as turtles, dolphins, dugongs, and migrating humpback whales between July and September.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Dampier+Archipelago&kgmid=/m/024vbx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwie4-iXr5ORAxWkj44IHQdAHlMQgPwRegQIBBAB)

references_text: Dream road trips for real life adventures. Perth Waterfall Day Trip A Day in Perth Perth Wildflower Trail Rottnest by Ferry and Bi...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-a57be8b1990b:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegQIMxAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIhAQQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUImQQQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpgUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpQUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIuAUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUItwUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI7gQQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIiAUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8QQQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9QQQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9AQQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8gQQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8AQQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9gQQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

references_text: 18 of the best things to do in Perth * Picnic in Kings Park and Botanic Garden. Kings Park. ... * Ascend the Swan Bell Tower. Sun...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-a57be8b1990b:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegQIMxAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIhAQQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUImQQQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpgUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpQUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIuAUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUItwUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI7gQQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIiAUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8QQQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9QQQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9AQQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8gQQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8AQQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9gQQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_text: 21 Jan 2025 —  The 19 best things to do in and around Perth * See quokkas on Rottnest Island. The cute and furry cherub-faced marsupi...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-a57be8b1990b:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegQIMxAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIhAQQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUImQQQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpgUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpQUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIuAUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUItwUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI7gQQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIiAUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8QQQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9QQQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9AQQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8gQQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8AQQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9gQQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-a57be8b1990b:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegQIMxAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIhAQQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUImQQQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpgUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpQUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIuAUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUItwUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI7gQQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIiAUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8QQQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9QQQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9AQQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8gQQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8AQQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9gQQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-a57be8b1990b:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegQIMxAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIhAQQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUImQQQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpgUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpQUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIuAUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUItwUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI7gQQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIiAUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8QQQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9QQQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9AQQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8gQQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8AQQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9gQQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-a57be8b1990b:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegQIMxAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIhAQQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUImQQQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpgUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpQUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIuAUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUItwUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI7gQQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIiAUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8QQQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9QQQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9AQQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8gQQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8AQQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9gQQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.
