references_text: 27 Apr 2025 — If you're visiting between May and November, don't miss the chance to go on a whale watching tour. These tours offer a ...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-a57be8b1990b:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegQIMxAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIhAQQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUImQQQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpgUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpQUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIuAUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUItwUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI7gQQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIiAUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8QQQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9QQQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9AQQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8gQQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI8AQQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUI9gQQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegQIMxAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIhAQQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUImQQQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpgUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpQUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIuAUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUItwUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIhAQQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUImQQQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpgUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIpQUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUIuAUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=de84d0bdc7a8d963&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj-zuOUr5ORAxW-slYBHUNsG4YQxccNegUItwUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

ai_mode_summary:
**Outdoor and nature activities** 

![Image of Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSzgkO8rr-GqWMBInTy_CNAVQh4NHq4hMLjQRUVd6iI2YkmvCLdY8ASh8LfDQ7q5u_lZ6H_Z2779_xh7R_31aFuCVM3AEZfG-rfvVZVCQU_8rRjqkMwwQgo7Howzii4IKG98ODLrNA=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Kings Park and Botanic Garden	

4.8(27.5K)

National park

 A massive inner-city park featuring panoramic views of the city skyline and Swan River . Explore walking trails and the [Western Australian Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIAxAG) , which showcases over 3,000 species of native flora . The park also features the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIAxAI) , children's play areas, and free guided walks.

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-42dc3219935b:12)
Rottnest Island A short ferry ride from Fremantle or Perth, this island is known for its beaches and quokkas. Activities include swimming, snorkelling, cycling, and guided walking tours . Tours, activities, and accommodation options can be found on the [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQ3egRegQIAxAN) website.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQgPwRegQIAxAK) 

![Image of Swan River](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSwTBkiLrcekabnGYOy5vem9dLWDSf4ZRA0dDm5BASTFDxHoHjjcovjb_4-0v30cdHw4pl57pbqOArAgAqG-Womi_wS_ZaUt3t-VAmfsPF4jhQLofH97f5OxOGZsp8IqN2uxtQG5=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Swan River	

4.6(255)

River

 Enjoy a river cruise, some of which feature live music or themed dinners . For something more active, you can take a half-day kayak tour on the [Canning River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/08jwbj&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIAxAU) , a sheltered part of the Swan River.

![Image of Hyde Park](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxXJAKUsqrVEkgvOs6N_vmqP2xRpToWwi3lOhpxfY688gIdZLjLK5AitrBoqDLam8tdPIyPfMyImClCIo-xHJh6qO81NkTV-NwKGrrMNwpVzvAR55I-brtQaNEAYc1AS-QC-Ef_sw=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Hyde Park	

4.7(4.7K)

Park

 This park hosts free, pay-as-you-feel vinyasa yoga classes on weekends from October to May. The sessions are suitable for all levels.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://www.visitperth.com/see-and-do/parks-gardens-and-reserves/Venues/kings-park#:~:text=In%20the%20very%20heart%20of,more%20in%20the%20video%20below%29.)[[4]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://www.facebook.com/events/hyde-park/yoga-in-the-park-perth-pay-as-you-feel/2302240346883870/)

**Culture and heritage** 

![Image of Elizabeth Quay](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSwzpjOpwufvSJUo0oxROcWEpSFj5-IPvYlrjUUaRjtzQVdgVzPd4c7g_YXm9ogpgkhrA2YIchnpePKtdlGx8NoHnYUCflXgwiN0cqXWaOBLJiSQrhPvognmyKnl87LN-keTtBU=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Elizabeth Quay	

4.5(20.8K)

Tourist attraction

 Take a guided cultural walking tour of [Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIBxAG) to learn about its history and Aboriginal significance through expert storytelling.

![Image of The Bell Tower](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxRugwNtSLD9ATj_X3TVCejF0vwdEOJO8Jy8_xDPWJyaFw7g38c9usaK9UGPspD2duF7bB2qPiBiuH5eYNPCuWSAtQV-PafClmmbsn1MBbJgdXREXIugU0vkLDXvVq5ZRd-Y_s0hA=s108-w108-h144-n-k-no)

The Bell Tower	

4.3(2.5K)

Tourist attraction

 To celebrate its 25th anniversary, [The Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIBxAN) is offering free entry and activities during a family-friendly weekend in December 2025 . The building holds a unique collection of historic bells.

![Image of Fremantle Arts Centre](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipOkx87KOrYQo686RDBDJWxb3m77BWXXzkYD9V79=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Fremantle Arts Centre	

4.5(1.1K)

Art center

 Western Australia's longest-running makers market, the Bazaar Makers Market, is held here in December, featuring local artisans and designers. The event also includes art classes and live music.

![Image of Wadjemup Museum](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSx5ncNY5QtQOQBTysL-EAzmc2A5d5dSojIf6O-qB6wz_POQWB317Vn0ZQ15zHWtlC5-nw0QxTSnlY8x5f0MML6BOrlKf0QlxeRyjZQL7lRdfBC3wI6ocVqmFBVRolHs006b85Em=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Wadjemup Museum	

4.5(66)

Local history museum

 Located on [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQ3egRegQIBxAZ) , this museum explores the island's history, including its natural history, Aboriginal culture, and its use as a place of imprisonment.[[1]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[2]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

**Entertainment and events** 

- **Live Music:** Catch live jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQICRAC) , with upcoming performances by Simone Craddock and the South Perth Lions Big Band. [The Moon bar](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/113fcr_xp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQICRAE) also hosts free jazz on Wednesday evenings.
- **Planetarium Experience:** For adults aged 18 and over, Scitech offers an immersive, full-dome planetarium show featuring Pink Floyd's "The Dark Side of the Moon".
- **Festivals:** Keep an eye out for various festivals, such as the Polo In the Park at Langley Park and the picnic-themed PICNIC Festival on the South Perth Foreshore.
- **Markets:** Explore different markets, including the FOMO Festive Fair in Fremantle and the Bayswater Twilight Market , which feature food trucks and market stalls.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/25154606694157586/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[3]](https://www.themoon.com.au/event-details/jazz-wednesdays-with-the-pete-jeavons-trio-2025-12-03-18-00)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/polo-in-the-park/4445/)[[6]](https://theguide.live/guide/picnic-festival-1)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[8]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)

![Image of Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSzgkO8rr-GqWMBInTy_CNAVQh4NHq4hMLjQRUVd6iI2YkmvCLdY8ASh8LfDQ7q5u_lZ6H_Z2779_xh7R_31aFuCVM3AEZfG-rfvVZVCQU_8rRjqkMwwQgo7Howzii4IKG98ODLrNA=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Kings Park and Botanic Garden	

4.8(27.5K)

National park

 A massive inner-city park featuring panoramic views of the city skyline and Swan River . Explore walking trails and the [Western Australian Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIAxAG) , which showcases over 3,000 species of native flora . The park also features the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIAxAI) , children's play areas, and free guided walks.

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-42dc3219935b:12)
Rottnest Island A short ferry ride from Fremantle or Perth, this island is known for its beaches and quokkas. Activities include swimming, snorkelling, cycling, and guided walking tours . Tours, activities, and accommodation options can be found on the [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQ3egRegQIAxAN) website.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQgPwRegQIAxAK) 

![Image of Swan River](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSwTBkiLrcekabnGYOy5vem9dLWDSf4ZRA0dDm5BASTFDxHoHjjcovjb_4-0v30cdHw4pl57pbqOArAgAqG-Womi_wS_ZaUt3t-VAmfsPF4jhQLofH97f5OxOGZsp8IqN2uxtQG5=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Swan River	

4.6(255)

River

 Enjoy a river cruise, some of which feature live music or themed dinners . For something more active, you can take a half-day kayak tour on the [Canning River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/08jwbj&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIAxAU) , a sheltered part of the Swan River.

![Image of Hyde Park](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxXJAKUsqrVEkgvOs6N_vmqP2xRpToWwi3lOhpxfY688gIdZLjLK5AitrBoqDLam8tdPIyPfMyImClCIo-xHJh6qO81NkTV-NwKGrrMNwpVzvAR55I-brtQaNEAYc1AS-QC-Ef_sw=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Hyde Park	

4.7(4.7K)

Park

 This park hosts free, pay-as-you-feel vinyasa yoga classes on weekends from October to May. The sessions are suitable for all levels.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://www.visitperth.com/see-and-do/parks-gardens-and-reserves/Venues/kings-park#:~:text=In%20the%20very%20heart%20of,more%20in%20the%20video%20below%29.)[[4]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://www.facebook.com/events/hyde-park/yoga-in-the-park-perth-pay-as-you-feel/2302240346883870/)

**Culture and heritage** 

![Image of Elizabeth Quay](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSwzpjOpwufvSJUo0oxROcWEpSFj5-IPvYlrjUUaRjtzQVdgVzPd4c7g_YXm9ogpgkhrA2YIchnpePKtdlGx8NoHnYUCflXgwiN0cqXWaOBLJiSQrhPvognmyKnl87LN-keTtBU=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Elizabeth Quay	

4.5(20.8K)

Tourist attraction

 Take a guided cultural walking tour of [Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIBxAG) to learn about its history and Aboriginal significance through expert storytelling.

![Image of The Bell Tower](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxRugwNtSLD9ATj_X3TVCejF0vwdEOJO8Jy8_xDPWJyaFw7g38c9usaK9UGPspD2duF7bB2qPiBiuH5eYNPCuWSAtQV-PafClmmbsn1MBbJgdXREXIugU0vkLDXvVq5ZRd-Y_s0hA=s108-w108-h144-n-k-no)

The Bell Tower	

4.3(2.5K)

Tourist attraction

 To celebrate its 25th anniversary, [The Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIBxAN) is offering free entry and activities during a family-friendly weekend in December 2025 . The building holds a unique collection of historic bells.

![Image of Fremantle Arts Centre](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipOkx87KOrYQo686RDBDJWxb3m77BWXXzkYD9V79=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Fremantle Arts Centre	

4.5(1.1K)

Art center

 Western Australia's longest-running makers market, the Bazaar Makers Market, is held here in December, featuring local artisans and designers. The event also includes art classes and live music.

![Image of Wadjemup Museum](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSx5ncNY5QtQOQBTysL-EAzmc2A5d5dSojIf6O-qB6wz_POQWB317Vn0ZQ15zHWtlC5-nw0QxTSnlY8x5f0MML6BOrlKf0QlxeRyjZQL7lRdfBC3wI6ocVqmFBVRolHs006b85Em=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Wadjemup Museum	

4.5(66)

Local history museum

 Located on [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQ3egRegQIBxAZ) , this museum explores the island's history, including its natural history, Aboriginal culture, and its use as a place of imprisonment.[[1]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[2]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

**Entertainment and events** 

- **Live Music:** Catch live jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQICRAC) , with upcoming performances by Simone Craddock and the South Perth Lions Big Band. [The Moon bar](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/113fcr_xp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQICRAE) also hosts free jazz on Wednesday evenings.
- **Planetarium Experience:** For adults aged 18 and over, Scitech offers an immersive, full-dome planetarium show featuring Pink Floyd's "The Dark Side of the Moon".
- **Festivals:** Keep an eye out for various festivals, such as the Polo In the Park at Langley Park and the picnic-themed PICNIC Festival on the South Perth Foreshore.
- **Markets:** Explore different markets, including the FOMO Festive Fair in Fremantle and the Bayswater Twilight Market , which feature food trucks and market stalls.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/25154606694157586/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[3]](https://www.themoon.com.au/event-details/jazz-wednesdays-with-the-pete-jeavons-trio-2025-12-03-18-00)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/polo-in-the-park/4445/)[[6]](https://theguide.live/guide/picnic-festival-1)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[8]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)

Local history museum

**Entertainment and events** 

- **Live Music:** Catch live jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQICRAC) , with upcoming performances by Simone Craddock and the South Perth Lions Big Band. [The Moon bar](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/113fcr_xp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQICRAE) also hosts free jazz on Wednesday evenings.
- **Planetarium Experience:** For adults aged 18 and over, Scitech offers an immersive, full-dome planetarium show featuring Pink Floyd's "The Dark Side of the Moon".
- **Festivals:** Keep an eye out for various festivals, such as the Polo In the Park at Langley Park and the picnic-themed PICNIC Festival on the South Perth Foreshore.
- **Markets:** Explore different markets, including the FOMO Festive Fair in Fremantle and the Bayswater Twilight Market , which feature food trucks and market stalls.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/25154606694157586/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[3]](https://www.themoon.com.au/event-details/jazz-wednesdays-with-the-pete-jeavons-trio-2025-12-03-18-00)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/polo-in-the-park/4445/)[[6]](https://theguide.live/guide/picnic-festival-1)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[8]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)

4.8(27.5K)

National park

 A massive inner-city park featuring panoramic views of the city skyline and Swan River . Explore walking trails and the [Western Australian Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIAxAG) , which showcases over 3,000 species of native flora . The park also features the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQIAxAI) , children's play areas, and free guided walks.

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280022-6179-0139-0000-42dc3219935b:12)
Rottnest Island A short ferry ride from Fremantle or Perth, this island is known for its beaches and quokkas. Activities include swimming, snorkelling, cycling, and guided walking tours . Tours, activities, and accommodation options can be found on the [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQ3egRegQIAxAN) website.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQgPwRegQIAxAK)

![Image of Fremantle Arts Centre](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipOkx87KOrYQo686RDBDJWxb3m77BWXXzkYD9V79=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Fremantle Arts Centre	

4.5(1.1K)

Art center

 Western Australia's longest-running makers market, the Bazaar Makers Market, is held here in December, featuring local artisans and designers. The event also includes art classes and live music.

![Image of Wadjemup Museum](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSx5ncNY5QtQOQBTysL-EAzmc2A5d5dSojIf6O-qB6wz_POQWB317Vn0ZQ15zHWtlC5-nw0QxTSnlY8x5f0MML6BOrlKf0QlxeRyjZQL7lRdfBC3wI6ocVqmFBVRolHs006b85Em=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Wadjemup Museum	

4.5(66)

Local history museum

 Located on [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQ3egRegQIBxAZ) , this museum explores the island's history, including its natural history, Aboriginal culture, and its use as a place of imprisonment.[[1]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[2]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

**Entertainment and events** 

- **Live Music:** Catch live jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQICRAC) , with upcoming performances by Simone Craddock and the South Perth Lions Big Band. [The Moon bar](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/113fcr_xp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwig4ICZr5ORAxXVklYBHbKcJYkQqdYPegQICRAE) also hosts free jazz on Wednesday evenings.
- **Planetarium Experience:** For adults aged 18 and over, Scitech offers an immersive, full-dome planetarium show featuring Pink Floyd's "The Dark Side of the Moon".
- **Festivals:** Keep an eye out for various festivals, such as the Polo In the Park at Langley Park and the picnic-themed PICNIC Festival on the South Perth Foreshore.
- **Markets:** Explore different markets, including the FOMO Festive Fair in Fremantle and the Bayswater Twilight Market , which feature food trucks and market stalls.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/25154606694157586/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[3]](https://www.themoon.com.au/event-details/jazz-wednesdays-with-the-pete-jeavons-trio-2025-12-03-18-00)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/polo-in-the-park/4445/)[[6]](https://theguide.live/guide/picnic-festival-1)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[8]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)
